meanings.definition: Involving cooperation, agreement, or compromise between two major political parties.
meanings.sent1: The bipartisan effort to pass the new law was successful.
meanings.sent2: The bill received bipartisan support from both parties.
meanings.sent3: The bipartisan picnic brought together politicians from different sides for hot dogs and games.
meanings.sent4: The bipartisan handshake symbolized unity and collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The bipartisan decision to work together made a lasting impact on the community.

meanings.definition: Supported by or involving members of two political parties.
meanings.sent1: The bipartisan committee included representatives from both parties.
meanings.sent2: The bipartisan resolution was passed with votes from both sides.
meanings.sent3: The bipartisan dance competition had politicians showing off their moves together.
meanings.sent4: The bipartisan event showcased unity in diversity.
meanings.sent5: The bipartisan agreement led to a harmonious outcome for all.
